Actions.Text:
use AppleScript version "2.4" -- Yosemite (10.10) or later
use scripting additions

try
	tell application "System Events"
		tell process "Safari"
			
			if value of ¬
				text area 1 of ¬
				scroll area 1 of ¬
				group 1 of ¬
				tab group 1 of ¬
				splitter group 1 of ¬
				front window contains "1Password" then
				
				click button "Allow" of ¬
					group 1 of ¬
					tab group 1 of ¬
					splitter group 1 ¬
						of front window
				
			end if
		end tell
		
		set visible of first item of ¬
			(application processes where name contains "1Password") to false
		
	end tell
end try
